question.body: Which of the following types of joints is incorrectly matched with an example?

multiple_choice.choice: amphiarthrosis - the ribs to the sternum

response.feedback: Incorrect. The bones of the skull are immovable so are classified as synarthrosis articulations.
Incorrect. The bones of the ribs have limited motion with the sternum so are classified as amphiarthrosis articulations.
Incorrect. The elbow has range of motion so is classified as a diarthrosis articulation.
Correct. An amphiarthotic joint is only slightly moveable while the hip is a ball-and-socket joint which is a diathrotic joint.
